job_title: Dynamics and Power Platform Support Analyst
job_purpose: To support core business systems including Microsoft Dynamics and Power Platform, ensuring smooth operations and effective utilization of these technologies.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Configure Microsoft Dynamics 365 via Power Apps for forms, workflows, reports, and security roles
Utilize Power Automate and Power Apps for automation and application development
Develop interactive reports and dashboards using Power BI
Support and troubleshoot Microsoft Dynamics 365 CRM environments
Engage with stakeholders and communicate effectively across different levels of the business
Proactively seek ways to streamline systems for continuous improvement
Provide strong documentation and verbal communication
Demonstrate advanced problem-solving and troubleshooting abilities
Participate in workshops to co-design technical solutions aligned with business needs
required_qualifications: Experience configuring Microsoft Dynamics 365 via Power Apps
Proficiency in Power Automate and Power Apps
Experience developing interactive reports and dashboards using Power BI
Ability to work collaboratively in a small team supporting a large enterprise
company_details: acQuire provides strategic software solutions for data challenges impacting Environmental, Social and Governance (ESG). Founded in 1996, acQuire is now part of Constellation Software, Inc. and operates globally with a focus on integrated-life-approach to employment.
